text: Kenneth William Yao (born 5 September 1998) is an Ivorian professional footballer who plays as a defender. He is currently a free agent. ==Career== Originating from Ivory Coast, Yao signed his first professional contract with Charlton Athletic in May 2016 and went onto make his first-team debut during their EFL Cup tie against AFC Wimbledon, featuring for the entire 90 minutes in the 2–2 draw. On 17 September 2018, Yao joined Dartford on loan until 20 October 2018.
